description: Another boy who claimed to be straight as hell. Well, the only straight thing I have seen was his erected dick when he had to jerk in front of me. But let me start right at the beginning. I got a call from a certain boy who wanted to meet me at daytime. Quite unusual but I realized that he didn´t want his girlfriend to find out about his financial situation. When I came there I had to wait almost 3 minutes for him to come down and open the gate. Not a nice place though you could see that at least a woman is living there as well. He told me about several debts that summed up to about 40,000 crowns. A whole lot for a youngster like him. But when I offered to give him the money just for a little "favor" he rejected. I was about to leave when he finally changed his mind. And then - step by step - he became my bitch for that certain afternoon.
title: Debt Dandy 42
